Google Home is powered by the Google Assistant. Ask it questions. Tell it to do things. It's your own Google, always ready to help.

Hands-Free Assistance Anywhere: Enhance your daily routine with the Google Speaker Assistant, offering voice-activated help throughout your home - from weather updates to scheduling, all powered by Google Assistant.

Easily add a doorbell to any home: See whos stopping by with Roku Wire-Free Video Doorbell & Chime. The battery lasts up to 6 months on one charge, so you never leave your guests hanging, or connect to existing doorbell wiring for limited powers.
Easy to use and will automatically start up in English when connecting to your device for the first time. This speaker works globally with support for most languages and places internationally.
